name: Paradox (itch) (karco)
description:
A short puzzle-platformer where you travel between dimensions.  This game was made in about 3 days for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3.  The theme was "ON/ OFF" so this game makes you turn "ON/ OFF" the interdimensional traveling device.

This is my first published game on itch.io.  I know it sucks, but I hope you enjoy it!

CREDITS

everything was made by me in Gamemaker Studio 2 and bfxr.

- karco
